column4: i dont mean to be a nag but it saids when i try an save   You do not have the permissions necessary to save the file.    who do i gain the permissions?  i am the owner of the PC so ^^
which file are you trying to save and why?
open the file with "gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf"  Then you can edit and save it with root privileges. But be careful.
